outputs.output_descr:
As the first AWP of the project the 2012 AWP has the following objectives:
1.	To set up a management structure that will provide  Project Planning, Implementation and Coordination Support (output 7)
2.	To develop a strategy that aims at strengthening revenue collection and reporting (output 1)
3.	To strengthen Budget Preparation and Management (output 2)
4.	To support the development of Accounting and Reporting Systems (output 3)
5.	To support the strengthening of Payroll Management and Control (output 4)
6.	To strengthen the planning processes in the states and Review State Strategic Plans (SSP) 2012  2016 (output 5)

project_title: Planning and Public Expenditure Management (PPEM) Darfur
